info.name: Pages API
info.description:
Frontend guideline and cURL examples for all Pages endpoints. Variables used below: - Base URL: http://localhost:5000 ({{baseUrl}} in Postman) - Token: Bearer REPLACE_WITH_JWT ({{token}} in Postman) - Page ID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 ({{pageId}}) - Revision ID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 ({{revisionId}}) - Slug: about-us ({{slug}}) cURL commands: 1) Create page [AUTH] curl -X POST "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer REPLACE_WITH_JWT" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{ "title": "About Us", "content": "

About TechBirds.

", "excerpt": "About page excerpt", "status": "draft", "parentId": null, "menuOrder": 0, "template": null, "featuredMediaId": null, "seoTitle": "About Us - TechBirds", "seoDescription": "Learn more about TechBirds", "metaJson": "{\"key\":\"value\"}", "slug": "about-us", "changeSummary": "Initial version" }' 2) Update page [AUTH] curl -X PUT "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer REPLACE_WITH_JWT" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{ "title": "About TechBirds", "content": "

Updated About content.

", "excerpt": "Updated excerpt", "status": "published", "menuOrder": 1, "seoTitle": "About TechBirds - Updated", "seoDescription": "Updated SEO description", "changeSummary": "Publish updated content" }' 3) Get page by id curl -X GET "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" 4) Get page by slug curl -X GET "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages/slug/about-us" 5) List pages curl -X GET "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages?page=1&limit=20&search=about&status=published&sortBy=created&sortOrder=desc" 6) Soft delete page [AUTH] curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer REPLACE_WITH_JWT" 7) Hard delete page [AUTH] curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/hard" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer REPLACE_WITH_JWT" 8) List revisions [AUTH] curl -X GET "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/revisions" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer REPLACE_WITH_JWT" 9) Restore a revision [AUTH] curl -X POST "http://localhost:5000/api/Pages/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/restore/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer REPLACE_WITH_JWT" Notes: - Auth roles required per controller: Create/Update/Restore/Revisions: Author,Editor,Admin,SuperAdmin; Soft delete: Editor,Admin,SuperAdmin; Hard delete: Admin,SuperAdmin. Public endpoints: Get by id, Get by slug, List.
